events.message: The customer filed a claim reporting a collision involving their car on the highway during rush hour traffic.
The claim has been categorised under 'Auto Accident' due to involvement of a vehicle collision in the incident.
An agent has been assigned to manage the auto accident claim and reach out to the customer promptly.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and informed the customer about the next steps.
The customer was asked to submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and the accident report form.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and witness statements promptly.
The claims investigation team initiated a detailed review of the submitted evidence and contacted involved parties.
Investigation was completed establishing fault and estimating repair costs for the damaged vehicle.
A settlement offer covering car repairs and rental expenses was proposed to the customer for approval.
The customer provided positive feedback regarding the communication and the proposed settlement amount.
The claim was approved promptly after the customer accepted the settlement proposal in full.
Insurance payment was issued to cover all agreed costs relating to the vehicle repairs and rental reimbursements.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after the payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
